context.p: For users who installs the StellarOne for the first time, please refer to StellarOne Installation Guide for initial license activation. For users who want to renew license, please follow below procedures.

step.cmd: If users want to enter a new Activation Code, click the Specify Activation Code button.

li.p: The Specify Activation Code window appears. Input the new Activation Code to renew license for StellarOne console.
A message of succesful update will appear.

note.p: If the update fails, please check if the StellarOne server can connect externally to the TXOne Product License server.

step.cmd: If users want to renew license for the existing Activation Code, click the Renew License button.
The StellarOne will connect to the TXOne Product License server for licensing.
